text: While Senator Obama is more interested in playing political tit-for-tat, Senator Clinton believes the campaign's real focus should be on solving the economic challenges facing the country. The reality is that Senator Clinton detailed her stimulus plan days before Senator Obama introduced a plan. More importantly, she has a plan that jumpstarts the economy and addresses the housing crisis so that people are able to keep their homes. - Clinton campaign spokesman Phil Singer Experts Give High Marks To Hillary's Stimulus Plan
title: Press Release - Fact Sheet: Hillary's Stimulus Plan
